name: Drop (rogueNoodle)
description:
A fun and simple competitive balloon popping party game for two-players*.

Pop the black balloons. Don't pop the red ones. The game ends when either player reaches the bottom - the player with the highest score wins.

* while technically a two-player game, it can be fun playing against the "computer" too, so give it a try!

Controls:

Player 1 - A & D keys to spin
Player 2 - Left & Right arrow keys to spin

M - toggle music
N - toggle sound
